sections.label: about
content: Hiya folks, meet my friend Jose Manuel, he’s a really cool guy and also a UI designer and a frontend developer, he has more than 8 years of experience and has worked with people from all over the world.
He has skylls in: Accessible and Semantic HTML, CSS, Sass, Javascript, React, Nunjucks, GSAP, Gulp, Git, Netlify Serverless, among others.

sections.label: portfolio
content: <dl><dt>Features:</dt><dd>Built using Hooks,</dd><dd>Create, read, update, and delete product feedback using serverless functions,</dd><dd>Form validations when trying to create/edit feedback with React Hook Form,</dd><dd>Sort suggestions by most/least upvotes and most/least comments,</dd><dd>Filter suggestions by category,</dd><dd>Add comments and replies to a product feedback, and</dd><dd>Upvote feedback system</dd></dl>
Stack: React, react-select, React Hook Form, CSS (Grid and Flexbox for layout) with Sass as preprocessor, Serverless functions with Airtable as DB.
* Based on Frontend Mentor guru challenge.

sections.label: contact
content: If you have any questions or if you’d like to send me a message, please feel free to drop me a line at dev@josearellanes.me
